name: Mini Magic Dungeon
description:
Can you make it to the final room?

Use Fire, Lighting, and Rock to solve puzzles and defeat monsters as you try and reach the end.

Made in 8 Days for the Nokia 3310 Jam 4

Controls
  • Arrow Keys: Move / Interact with Signs & NPCs
  • Z: Use Magic
  • X: Change Magic
Credits & Thanks

Programming, Art, Music, SFX, Design: Damon Bolesta

Boss Music: Ian Valentine

Thanks to...

Ian Valentine for the SUPER SLAPPY Boss music track!

Alex Bolesta for play testing, feedback, quality assurance.

You, for playing!

Game made in Unity. Music / SFX made in Logic Pro. Art made in Photoshop. Uses the m3x6 font by Daniel Linnsen.
